price: 74. Aleeyîwohuk tu maabaanay, ni- abbobti nanu abnah innah taama neh abak sugteeh nanu wohul ken salleeh ken katatne iyyen.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
